Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

       A broad smile crossed Hell Beast's face. A senator of the Predacon 
Government, he was now going to unite the factions into the Neo Decepticon 
Empire. At last, the old ways and the new ways would merge. The generation 
gap would be bridged, at long last.
       "Agreed. Megatron will be thrilled. And with the Deceptiocns in our 
possesion, and the Autobots floating in space, were unstoppable. No longer 
will the Allience dominate the planet. The sun on the Maximals has begun to 
set, and the sun on the Neo Decepticon Empire has just begun to rise."

--part1_ad.63100c6.27a740a8_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
